name: The dream catcher (felipecortes)
description:
In this minimalist solo roleplaying game game, you control a dream catcher, an individual with the special ability to access dreams, both their own and other people's Within dreams, you will be able to promote changes, to influence the dreamer's subconscious, or to catch and bring to the physical world a single element (object or creature) from the dream.

HIGHLIGHTS

  • Simple mechanics that use a common deck of cards;
  • Word bank to frame dreams, scenes, character backgrounds and any other narrative elements;
  • Event generator table to frame scenes within dreams;
  • Possibility to generate scenes related to dreams within dreams.

WHAT DO YOU GET?

  • Four-page version of the game, both in english and in brazilian portuguese.
